title: [Neutral]  You may opt-out of receiving text (SMS) messages from Uber at any time

tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  By creating an Account, you agree that Uber can send you informational text (SMS) messages as part of the normal business operation of your use of the Services. You may opt-out of receiving text (SMS) messages from Uber at any time by texting the word STOP to 89203 from the mobile device receiving the messages.
